name: Daily Routine (bun_tired)
description:
Good Morning, Erica.
In order of sticking to your routine,
We kindly ask you to...

An RPG Maker game, where you stick to your routine during depression. Made as a way of practising the software in August of 2022.

FEATURES
Atmospheric 2 minute experience
